title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 71.11 - Notification of award
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 5 ยง 71.11 - Notification of award

State Regulations

The department will provide written notification to the
applicant and, if applicable, the financing institution offering the loan, of
the department's approval of the applicant's application and of the type and
amount of approved program assistance. Such approval may be conditional upon
the financing institution making the loan to the applicant within a time period
specified by the department. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 5
ยง
71.11

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
